snippet: Commonwealth Games Federation President Louise Martins has traveled to South Africa for crisis meetings as Durban faces the possibility of losing out on hosting the 2022 Commonwealth Games....

headline.main: Ethiopia Opposition Leader Charged With Inciting Unrest
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia Opposition Leader Charged With Inciting Unrest

lead_paragraph: Commonwealth Games Federation President Louise Martins has traveled to South Africa for crisis meetings as Durban faces the possibility of losing out on hosting the 2022 Commonwealth Games.
